RelatedSentence: Police have identified a 36 - year - old man who was fatally shot late Saturday in Southeast Washington .
Just before midnight Saturday , police received a report of a shooting in the 2700 block of Langston Place SE , just off the Suitland Parkway .
When officers arrived , they found Simwone Keith Milstead of Southeast , who later died at a hospital .
Police are continuing to investigate the shooting and are offering a reward of up to $ 25,000 .

A 20 - year - old Centreville man has died of stab wounds suffered during an altercation Saturday night , Fairfax County police said .

Domingo Eduardo Santiago Cuchil was found lying on a sidewalk in the 14400 block of Golden Oak Road in Centerville about 11 p.m. Saturday by police investigating a report of an assault with a weapon , authorities said .

Domingo Eduardo Santiago Cuchil was found lying on a sidewalk in the 14400 block of Golden Oak Road in Centerville about 11 p.m. Saturday by police investigating a report of an assault with a weapon , authorities said .
Cuchil was taken to a hospital , where he was apronounced dead Sunday , authorities said .
Police said officers were told that another injured man was in a nearby home in the 14400 block of Cool Oak Lane .
Lucy Caldwell , a police spokeswoman , said investigators do not consider the assault gang - related .
Anyone with information is asked to call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-8477 .
